content: 3 You know how Pepsi is all about the next/new/millennial generation? Do something to show that the new generation is way more awesome than anyone thinks they are. Donate $30million to Meals on Wheels or other community-based senior programs. Then start an initiative to connect young people with these organizations. Generations are all connected. We’re all part of the same circle. This stuff writes itself. Also, you’ll be a hero for saving Meals on Wheels. You can even put Pepsi in all the meals. You’ve earned it.
